mapper.update:
update customer
CUS_ARE_ID = #{cusAreId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CUS_CK_ID = #{cusCkId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CUS_NAME = #{cusName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CUS_NUMBER = #{cusNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CUS_ADDRESS = #{cusAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CUS_CHANGE_ORIGIN = #{cusChangeOrigin,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CUS_CHANGE_DESCRIBE = #{cusChangeDescribe,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CUS_SUCCESS_PROBABILITY = #{cusSuccessProbability,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CUS_MANAGER = #{cusManager,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CUS_ALLOT_NAME = #{cusAllotName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CUS_ALLOT_DATE = #{cusAllotDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CUS_POSTAL_CODE = #{cusPostalCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CUS_TELEPHONE = #{cusTelephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CUS_FASIMILE = #{cusFasimile,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CUS_URL = #{cusUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CUS_REGISTER_NUMBER = #{cusRegisterNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CUS_LEGAL_PERSON = #{cusLegalPerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CUS_REGISTER_MONEY = #{cusRegisterMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CUS_RMB = #{cusRmb,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CUS_OPENING_BANK = #{cusOpeningBank,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CUS_BANK_ACCOUNT = #{cusBankAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

CUS_STATE_TAXES = #{cusStateTaxes,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CUS_RESUME = #{cusResume,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CUS_CREDITWORTHINESS = #{cusCreditworthiness,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CUS_STATISFCING = #{cusStatisfcing,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CUS_STATE = #{cusState,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
where CUS_ID = #{cusId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update customer set CUS_ARE_ID = #{cusAreId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CUS_CK_ID = #{cusCkId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CUS_NAME = #{cusName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CUS_NUMBER = #{cusNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CUS_ADDRESS = #{cusAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CUS_CHANGE_ORIGIN = #{cusChangeOrigin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CUS_CHANGE_DESCRIBE = #{cusChangeDescribe,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CUS_SUCCESS_PROBABILITY = #{cusSuccessProbability,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CUS_MANAGER = #{cusManager,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CUS_ALLOT_NAME = #{cusAllotName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CUS_ALLOT_DATE = #{cusAllotDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CUS_POSTAL_CODE = #{cusPostalCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CUS_TELEPHONE = #{cusTelephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CUS_FASIMILE = #{cusFasimile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CUS_URL = #{cusUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CUS_REGISTER_NUMBER = #{cusRegisterNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CUS_LEGAL_PERSON = #{cusLegalPerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CUS_REGISTER_MONEY = #{cusRegisterMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CUS_RMB = #{cusRmb,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CUS_OPENING_BANK = #{cusOpeningBank,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CUS_BANK_ACCOUNT = #{cusBankAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CUS_CROWN_RENT = #{cusCrownRent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CUS_STATE_TAXES = #{cusStateTaxes,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CUS_RESUME = #{cusResume,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CUS_CREDITWORTHINESS = #{cusCreditworthiness,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CUS_STATISFCING = #{cusStatisfcing,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CUS_STATE = #{cusState,jdbcType=DECIMAL} where CUS_ID = #{cusId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
SELECT FROM customer
cus_name LIKE "%"#{cusName,jdbc=VARCHAR}"%"
AND cus_manager LIKE "%"#{cusManager,jdbcType=VARCHAR}"%"
AND cus_state LIKE "%"#{cusState,jdbcType=DECIMAL}"%"
